plot: A poor homeless bum comes across a wealthy elitist and cleverly and humorously attempts to steal some of his belongings right off of his person.
title: The Bum of Beauregard
plot_es: A poor homeless bum comes across a wealthy elitist and cleverly and humorously attempts to steal some of his belongings right off of his person.
plot_en: A poor homeless bum comes across a wealthy elitist and cleverly and humorously attempts to steal some of his belongings right off of his person.
